channel.title: How can i make admins on my server be able to trade?
channel.description: how can i make admins on my server be able to trade? also if u can help god swords on my server don't have a spec, how to i make them have 1 :)? If you can help me with any of my probs above please do :P thanks :)

item.title: How can i make admins on my server be able to trade?
item.dc:creator: @ash_2oo8 ash 2oo8
item.description:
@ash_2oo8 wrote:

i can find were the admin’s can trade and ::empty or drop,

go into the client.java
and search for,

}
if(other.playerRights == 5){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;
}
if(playerRights == 5){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);
return;

change the 0’s to 5’s then it shud work,
make sure u compile ;D

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make admins on my server be able to trade?
item.dc:creator: @joeyman178 joeyman178
item.description:
@joeyman178 wrote:

There should be a line in your client.java that looks a bit like this
}
if (PlayerHandler.players[tradeWith].playerRights >= 1 || playerRights == 2) {
sendMsg(“RichScape Moderators can’t trade other players.”);
resetTrade();

If there is all you have to do is change the player rights to 4 or something. Because you change the player rights to 4 mods and admins will be able to trade.

Read full topic
